description: {"blocks":[{"key":"41t14","text":"Abstract","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ape9","text":"Neurocysticercosis is a parasitic neurological disease, considered by the World Health Organization (WHO) as one of the most neglected tropical diseases in the world, also being an important public health concern in Brazil.  The eggs of the Taenia solium hatch and the larvae spread through highly vascularized tissues, including the brain. Most patients are asymptomatic, but in some cases, cysts can cause inflammation, which can lead to headaches, seizures, and intracranial hypertension. The preferred treatment for neurocysticercosis remains unclear: the combination therapy of albendazole plus praziquantel has been associated with greater benefits than albendazole alone.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84cdm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c5sjd","text":"Review title:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80pfp","text":"Albendazole plus Praziquantel versus Albendazole Alone in the Treatment of Neurocysticercosis: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"tleh","text":"PICO: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fb4ts","text":"P - patients with neurocysticercosis;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2iolj","text":"I - treatment with albendazole and praziquentel associated;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2643r","text":"C - placebo, praziquentel alone or with an increased dose or albendazole alone or with an increased dose;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23pqd","text":"O - complete resolution of the cyst, adverse effects and recurrence of seizures;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47c62","text":"T - observational or randomized;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ath6h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"903bj","text":"Exclusion criteria: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"90n7u","text":"alone albendazole or praziquantel used in the intervention group; absence of group control; non-English language; conference abstracts.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ecudc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"er4cl","text":"Searches:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2uqu1","text":"We searched MEDLINE, Embase, and Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials from inception to May 11, 2024.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8gb0o","text":" Search strategy: (combined OR combination) AND (praziquantel) AND (albendazole) AND (neurocysticercosis OR “brain cysticercosis”).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cquil","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9iscm","text":"Data extraction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3piqe","text":"Four authors independently (L.M.V., M.E.S., G.O.C, L.L.LS.) conducted data extraction, collecting the following information from each study: study population, number of patients, resolution of the cyst or damage,  adverse events, seizure relapse and the use of other medications, such as anti-inflammatories and corticosteroids. No data conversion was required.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fedch","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"794j6","text":"Endpoints:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bumvg","text":"The primary outcome was the resolution of the cyst or lesion. Secondary outcomes included the adverse effects of using the combination, such as headaches and seizure recurrence after treatment. In addition, it was analyzed to consider the use of other medications, like anti-inflammatories and corticosteroids.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3iu0o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1kpes","text":"Statistical Analysis::","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lvdr","text":"We used R software version 4.3.2 (R Foundation for Statistical Computing) and the extension package “meta” for all statistical analyses. Studies were eligible for synthesis if data on each outcome were available. Binary outcomes were analyzed using odds ratio (OR) or risk ratio (RR). Statistical significance was set as p-values \u003c 0,5. Heterogeneity was assessed using I² statistics, and significance was attributed to cases with I²\u003e25%. For all outcomes, the Mantel-Haenszel random-effects model was applied. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fi540","text":"Quality Assessment:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8pfev","text":"Assessment of risk of bias in individual studies was conducted using the Cochrane Risk of Bias tool for randomized trials. Two independent authors evaluated the bias risk of each study and documented their observations. Disagreements were resolved through discussion and consensus ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6t46c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Albendazole plus Praziquantel versus Albendazole Alone in the Treatment of Neurocysticercosis: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis
